content.html: Great post on a super clean way to add user AND resource level permissions to your @inertiajs app. Thanks Sebastian! Exactly what I needed ‚ù§Ô∏è
content.text: Great post on a super clean way to add user AND resource level permissions to your @inertiajs app. Thanks Sebastian! Exactly what I needed ‚ù§Ô∏è

content.html: Great Sebastian. Just at the right time too, this is literally next on my list to implement into our app.
content.text: Great Sebastian. Just at the right time too, this is literally next on my list to implement into our app.

content.html: I've used can in the past. I like it on the user level, but not on the resource level. For example `user.can.createPost` looks good, but `post.can.create` looks like the post can create something
content.text: I've used can in the past. I like it on the user level, but not on the resource level. For example `user.can.createPost` looks good, but `post.can.create` looks like the post can create something
